sources.title: Johnny You're Wanted
sources.description: Title: Johnny You're Wanted Summary: A truck driver is accused of the murder of a hitch hiker. Directed by: Vernon Sewell Actors: John Slater, Alfred Marks, Garry Marsh Production Company: George Maynard Productions Release Date: January 1956 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A truck driver is accused of the murder of a hitch hiker.

metadata.Plot: A truck driver is accused of the murder of a hitch hiker.
metadata.Writer: Frank Driscoll, Michael Leighton, Maurice McLaughlin
metadata.Actors: John Slater, Alfred Marks, Garry Marsh
